metadata.synopsis: Dialog in which Rolan's Projection, who is substituing Rolan after Lorroakan is dead. The projection bars entry to the Sorcerous Sundries shop to a banned player.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) kill Lorroakan at  CTY_Main_A 4960; 0; 7052) Kill Rolan when he appears at the scene3) Go through any portal that is not the left one on the second floor of Ramazith at -1; 30; -97 (and revive yourself)4) call oe LOW_SorcerousSundries_AradinLeaveAndAttack in recon5)  ctrl+shift+k Klank at -15; 26; -686) attempt to enter the shop, getting interrupted

1.speaker: Rolan's Projection
1.text: Interfering with the magical staff of Sorcerous Sundries is prohibited. Any further transgressions, and you will be banned.
1.context: NodeContext: as a projection - cheery but stern warning

5.speaker: Rolan's Projection
5.text: Congratulations - you have been banned from Sorcerous Sundries. You will now be escorted outside.
5.context: NodeContext: as a projection - cheery but stern warning

2.speaker: Player
2.context: NodeContext: as a projection - cheery but stern warning

4.speaker: Rolan's Projection
4.text: Sorcerous Sundries assumes no responsibility for the harm you are about to suffer.
4.context: NodeContext: as a projection - cheery but stern warning

3.speaker: Player
3.context: NodeContext: as a projection - cheery but stern warning

0.speaker: Rolan's Projection
0.context: NodeContext: as a projection - cheery but stern warning
